mapper.insert: insert into linket.user (email, password, user_name, birthdate, agreement, phone, gender, role, account, reg_date, withdraw_date, enabled, last_updated_date, user_company_id) values (#{email},#{password},#{userName},#{birthdate},#{agreement},#{phone},#{gender},#{role},#{account},now(),#{withdrawDate}, #{enabled}, #{lastUpdatedDate}, #{companyId})
mapper.select: SELECT email, password, user_name as userName, birthdate, agreement, phone, gender, role, account, withdraw_date, enabled, user_company_id, reg_date, last_updated_date FROM user WHERE email=#{email} AND password=#{password}
SELECT email FROM user WHERE email=#{email}
